        public static void setNewBook(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.String author,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              int amount)
        Makes a new book in the BookInfo table and adds the specified amounts of books to the bookid table If at any points it encounters an error it will spit a generic error message along with the stack trace and roll back what it was doing
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        author - The author of the book
        title - The title of the book
        amount - The amount of books to initially add

      • getBookID

        public static int getBookID(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String author,
                            java.lang.String title,
                            boolean reconnect)
        Retrieves the book ID of a specific book type, not of the individual versions of the book
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        author - Author to search for
        title - Title to search for
        reconnect - true if a new connection needs to be opened
        Returns:
        The Id found

      • addStudent

        public static boolean addStudent(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 int id,
                                 java.lang.String telephone)
        Will insert a new student into the database, presumes that the info is correct, but will give a false if it failed
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        name - Name of the new student
        id - 4 digit id of the new student
        telephone - telephone of the new student
        Returns:
        true if succesfully added the student

      • addTeacher

        public static boolean addTeacher(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String id,
                                 java.lang.String department)
        Will insert a new teacher into the database, presumes that the info is correct, will return false if failed
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        name - Name of the teacher to add
        id - 3 digit string
        department - The name of the department
        Returns:
        true if teacher succesfully added

        Returns:

      • getStudent

        public static int getStudent(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             int id)
        Gets the internal id used by the database for a given student
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        name - The name as how the student is stored in the database
        id - The student id as is stored in the database
        Returns:
        the internal database id for a student, 0 if not found

      • getStudentBalance

        public static float getStudentBalance(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      int idStudent)
        Retrieves the balance of a student
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        idStudent - The internal id as found by getStudent(String, String, String, int)}
        Returns:
        The balance of a student

      • updatebalanceStudent

        public static float updatebalanceStudent(java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String password,
                                         int idStudent,
                                         float amountToAdd)
        Will update the balance of a student based on its current balance as found by getStudentBalance(String, String, int)} and the given amount to add Uses the getDate(String, String) to make sure it updates the transaction table correctly
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        idStudent - The internal id as found by getStudent(String, String, String, int)}
        amountToAdd - The amount to add to a students balance
        Returns:
        the new balance that is stored, is taken from the getStudentBalance(String, String, int) method

        name - The name as how the teacher is stored in the database
        id - The Teacher id as is stored in the database

      • updatebalanceTeacher

        public static float updatebalanceTeacher(java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String password,
                                         int idTeacher,
                                         float amountToAdd)
        Will update the balance of a teacher based on its current balance as found by getTeacherBalance(String, String, int)} and the given amount to add Uses the getDate(String, String) to make sure it updates the transaction table correctly
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        idTeacher - The internal id as found by getTeacher(String, String, String, String)}
        amountToAdd - The amount to add to a students balance
        Returns:
        the new balance that is stored, is taken from the getTeacherBalance(String, String, int) method to check

      • getAllStudents

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllStudents(java.lang.String username,
                                                                   java.lang.String password)
        Will get the id, activity and name from all the students
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        Returns:
        an Arraylist with strings in it where the first 4 characters are the id, the 5th is a boolean showing activity and then the name

      • getBooksBorrowed

        public static java.util.ArrayList<SpecificBook> getBooksBorrowed(java.lang.String username,
                                                                 java.lang.String password,
                                                                 int id,
                                                                 boolean isStudent)
        Gets an arrayList of specific books that are currently borrowed by a student or teacher
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        id - the internal id of the user to search for
        isStudent - true if the internal id is for a student
        Returns:
        an Arraylist of specificbooks, or null if no books are being borrowed by the teacher

      • getBookInfoByBookID

        public static SpecificBook getBookInfoByBookID(java.lang.String username,
                                               java.lang.String password,
                                               int bookID,
                                               boolean reconnect)
        Gets a specific book based on the internal id with all the details from that book
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        bookID - The id to get the details from
        reconnect - set to true if you are running this stand alone, set to false if you are running it whilst already connected to the database
        Returns:
        a specificBook with all the variables like id, author, title, borrowed, internal id

      • borrowBook

        public static boolean borrowBook(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 int bookid,
                                 int id,
                                 boolean isStudent)
        Will borrow the book, needs to mark the book as borrowed and fill in the details in the borrow table
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        bookid - The specific book id
        id - The id of the one borrowing the book
        isStudent - true if its a student
        Returns:
        true if successfully borrowed a book

        public static boolean checkIfActiveStudent(java.lang.String username,
                                           java.lang.String password,
                                           int id)
        Will check if the student is marked as active in the database, is needed before allowing to borrow
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        id - The internal student ID from a student
        Returns:
        the value stored in a database, false if something goes wrong

        password - Password to use to connect
        id - The internal teacher ID from a student
        Returns:
        the value stored in a database, false if something goes wrong

                                                                 java.lang.String password)

        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        Returns:

      • getNameByID

        private static java.lang.String getNameByID(int id,
                                            boolean isStudent,
                                            java.lang.String username,
                                            java.lang.String password)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the name of student or teacher
        Parameters:
        id - the internal id of the student or teacher
        isStudent - true if the id is for a student, false for a teacher
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        Returns:
        The name as stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws exception if communication with the database is not working correctly, or if the user id was not found

                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 int id)
        Will tell you if a book is currently borrowed
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to connect
        password - Password to use to connect
        id - The id of the book to check
        Returns:
        true if the book is currently on loan
